metadata.name: Remote Thread Created In KeePass.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects remote thread creation in "KeePass.exe" which could indicates potential password dumping activity

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('4') AND endswith(lower(process.file.path), lower('\\keepass.exe')))

output.summary: Detects remote thread creation in "KeePass.exe" which could indicates potential password dumping activity

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown References: https://www.cisa.gov/uscert/ncas/alerts/aa20-259a, https://github.com/denandz/KeeFarce, https://github.com/GhostPack/KeeThief
